Text: i like to take a moment to thank you and djfred for your efforts in doing these downloads in NTSC formats.  Being hearing impaired, having captioning/text is most appreciated. your tutorials are helpful as well.  to bad you do not have one on converting Xvids to NTSC, which would be appreciated at times.  thanks again
Very Good quality thank you, but why not watch with Cyberlink instead
More seeders would be highly appreciated, please. I can keep seeding later ;)
